sec.title: Non intended use
sec.p: Non intended uses shall be listed as far as practical and foreseeable. For rigs this includes:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: lifting and transporting loads or people and goods;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: cleaning stopes and drill locations using the feed;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: using jacks as support structure during tramming;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: using the boom to traverse rough terrain;

list-item.label: h)
list-item.p: using the boom as support structure during tramming;
